About the policy: Covers all accident-related eventualities of the insured and proves to be the best defence against the odd slips, twists and turns of life.
Maximum Up to Children: 3 Children (2A+3C) covered in a single policy

Risk Covered.Death Benefit: 100% of the Sum Insured (Within 12 Calendar months from the date of Accident)
Risk Covered.Permanent Total Disablement (PTD): 100% of the Sum Insured (Within 12 Calendar months from the date of Accident)
Risk Covered.Disability is confirmed and claimed with: 60 days from the occurrence of disablement
Risk Covered.Coverage for Dependent Children: Compensation for death or PTD will be 25% of the sum insured.
